post.text:
Thank you for your wonderful support last night- with regard to my Immigration Speech that I delivered at the Phoenix Convention Center. I love this country - and you, the people. Lets MAKE AMERICA SAFE AND GREAT AGAIN! I love you!
Donald J. Trump

comment.author: Brianna
comment.text: Dear Mr. Trump: great speech but how about also stopping birth tourism and birth right citizenship! Thousands of foreigners are flying here to have USC babies! Wish Trump had also addressed it!

replies.author: Brianna
replies.text: That was the only ting he didn't cover last night but it represents a huge problem when people can fly in from China and Turkey or wherever and have an instant USC baby.
